title: Tether Launches PearPass, a Peer-to-Peer Password Manager to Eliminate Cloud Breach Risks
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital asset industry, today announced the launch of PearPass, a first-of-its-kind, peer-to-peer password manager that keeps every credential securely on the user’s own device, never in the cloud. With […]
date: New app eliminates reliance on cloud servers and middlemen, giving users full control of their credentials 17 December 2025 –

title: Tether Leads $8M Strategic Investment in Speed to Advance Lightning-Native, Stablecoin-Powered Payments
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital assets industry, announced today that it has made a strategic investment in Speed1, Inc. (“Speed”), a payments infrastructure company building instant, global settlement rails using the Bitcoin Lightning Network and stablecoins. Tether led the company’s $8 million funding round together with ego death capital. […]
